title: [INTEL MKL] Support MKL quantized concat op
body_html:
This PR is to support MKL DNN based quantized concat operator. MKL DNN only supports the case that all input tensors have the same quantization range, all other cases will fall back to Eigen implementation.

Since most of the case the input tensors won't exactly have the same quantization range, we developed a graph transform tool to re-range the quantization range of all tensors to the same range, so it can take the optimized case supported by MKL DNN. With Inception V3 and V2, we found this change won't affect the accuracy. That graph transform will be submitted in another PR.

body:
This PR is to support MKL DNN based quantized concat operator. MKL DNN only supports the case that all input tensors have the same quantization range, all other cases will fall back to Eigen implementation. 

Since most of the case the input tensors won't exactly have the same quantization range, we developed a graph transform tool to re-range the quantization range of all tensors to the same range, so it can take the optimized case supported by MKL DNN. With Inception V3 and V2, we found this change won't affect the accuracy. That graph transform will be submitted in another PR.
